message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $125.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $125 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $105.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $118.
Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm happy to meet you halfway and offer $110 for the product.
I'm still a bit away from your offer, Bob. I'll try to find some more common ground. I'll sell the product to you for $115.
